sentence.text: hemopoiesis fusions are associated with myeloid and lymphoid neoplasms with eosinophilia.

We suggest that leukemias and lymphomas with hemopoiesis fusion genes exhibit similar clinicopathologic features to, and should be included in, the WHO category of AAAAAAMyeloid and lymphoid neoplasms with eosinophilia and abnormalities of positive regulation of cell proliferation, signal transduction, or positive regulation of cell proliferation, or with negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II-JAK2.AAAAA

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
